ygData.subject: Re: Introduction to Beserk 4...
ygData.msgSnippet: All right, Sky Knight said. One day at a time. I was just thinking ahead. He glared at Blazer. We can get drones? He closed his optics. How about this.

"All right," Sky Knight said. "One day at a time. I was just thinking 
ahead." He glared at Blazer. "We can get drones?" He closed his 
optics. "How about this. We test him against the drones, then see how 
he fairs against one of our team mates." He opened his optics 
again. "I want to see how well he can controll himself."

He leaned forward to see where Techy and Beserk went. He opened his 
comm-link to Techy. "Techy, get Beserk back down here. I don't want 
him going down there."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> Blazer frowns, looking at Techy follow Berserk. "Maybe. We should 
start him 
> out on training droids first, he might go too far with a real 
opponent."
> 
> The scientist frowns, looking at Berserk. "But we definetly 
shouldn't take 
> him out, it could be dangerous at this stage. What he doesn't know 
might 
> friten him, he might go berserk."
> 
> Blazer chuckles at his pun, watching Berserk.
